name: Zucchini Pasta Shrimp Scampi
author: Cindy Anschutz Barbieri
summary: Just love shrimp scampi and making it with zucchini noodles is even more delicious! Enjoy. Top with Parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, and a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, then serve family style!
ingredients: salt and ground pepper to taste
½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
directions: Cut zucchini into noodles using a spiralizer (fitted with the large shredding blade)
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes
Add chicken broth, lemon zest, 1/2 the lemon juice, and chile-garlic sauce
Add the zucchini noodles; season with salt and pepper and toss to coat
Add shrimp; cook and toss until warmed through, about 2 minutes more
